message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you this product at a price of $2,000,000. I believe this product would be a valuable asset to you, and I am confident that this is a fair price.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective on the market value, the product holds significant intrinsic value for me.  I'm willing to come down to $1,800,000. I believe this price reflects a fair compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $1,400,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and the compromise we've reached so far.
